p: Genus Caralluma arouses great interest in scientific fields due to its attractive immunostimulatory and pharmacological activities [ 29]. These activities could be due to its phytochemicals including glycoside and pregnane steroid [ 26, 27]. In Morocco, Caralluma europaea is widely used in folk medicine for its presumed anticancer activity [ 30]. However, no scientific data about its potential anticancer activity against cancerous cell lines were reported to the best of our knowledge.
